title: Winning Streak
overview: Winning Streak is the astonishing story of a group of young down-and-outs who are presented with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity; to change their luck and set off on the adventure of their lives. Thanks to an infallible method based on the roulette wheelâ€™s imperfection, their lifestyle is about to become better than their wildest dreams, as they set out to break the banks at casinos around the world.
